summary: Major hyperscalers (Microsoft, Google, Meta, AWS) have all announced aggressive increases in AI-related capital expenditures for 2024/2025, with Microsoft leading at ~$50B. Current H100/A100 rental prices remain elevated at $3.21/hr, indicating sustained demand despite minor corrections from peak levels. Industry momentum is further amplified by confirmed development of next-gen AI models (GPT-5 expected late 2024, Gemini 2 in development).
